channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Your financial adviser has a plan for your money. But what if it’s their plan too?
item.description: To get you to follow their advice, your adviser says, “I do this for myself.” Is that good enough?

item.title: Gold Futures Mount Small Recovery After Lower Rate Cut Hopes Prompted Selloff
item.description: Gold futures ticked up, recouping some ground but remaining lower on-week after market hopes for more than two U.S. interest rate cuts in 2025 waned, ...

item.title: Futures Steady Ahead of Short Christmas Eve Trading Session
item.description: Equity futures held broadly steady early Tuesday, ahead of a holiday-shortened pre-Christmas trading session, with the U.S. stock market due to close ...

item.title: Shutdown deal cost IRS $20 billion to probe for tax cheats, maybe for good
item.description: The IRS estimates there will be 8,000 fewer audits of wealthy taxpayers and businesses though 2029 without the sidelined $20.2 billion.

item.title: Netflix payout of $150 million for this pair of NFL games is a ‘prestige’ play, expert says
item.description: Christmas Day football games will be streamed exclusively on Netflix. Here’s what you should know.

item.title: Is the stock market open on Christmas Eve? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: It’s the height of the holiday season, so expect schedule changes.

item.title: Money Moves for the New Year: Setting and Keeping Your Personal-Finance Goals
item.description: A four-part podcast series that answers listeners’ questions about achieving their financial goals for 2025.

item.title: Bitcoin Edges Higher But Stays Below $100K
item.description: Bitcoin rose slightly but remained below the key $100,000 level, although some analysts expect its recent pullback to prove brief, with the next targe...

item.title: European Bond Yields Rise in Holiday-Thinned Trade
item.description: European sovereign bond yields rose amid subdued trading volumes ahead of the Christmas holiday period, with IG expecting low volatility.

item.title: This home builder issued its third profit warning in three months. Its stock is tanking.
item.description: Britain’s Vistry Group on Tuesday issued its third profit warning in as many months, sending its already-battered stock spiraling lower.
